item.description:
The CTNites.com VIP Entertainment Club Has Invited Us:

MEETUP IS BETWEEN 6:30and 6:45, SEATING STARTS AT 6:30. The Show starts at 7:30

VIP CLUB FUNNY BONE REGULARS - PLEASE KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR THE NEW PEOPLE AND HELP THEM GET SEATED AT OUR TABLES.

Wacky Wednesday At The Funny Bone Comedy Club

Buckland Hills Mall
Manchester, CT 06040
(860)-432-8600
www.HartfordFunnyBone.com

Admission is FREE every Wednesday Nite with a Funny Bone T-Shirt (T-Shirts cost $15)

There will be Meetup people sitting on the bench across from the Funny Bone ticket window. If you can't find the Meetup group, call Rob at (860) 569-8094. I will be there after 7 pm.
After the show, join us at:
Time-Out Sports Bar & Grill
346 West Middle Turnpike
(Manchester Parkade)
Manchester, CT 06040
649-7400

All CTNites.com VIP Clubbers will receive a 10% discount on everything!

The food is much better and less expensive than at the Funny Bone, so save your appetite for Time-Out after the Comedy show!

Directions to Time-Out from the Funny Bone Comedy Club:

1:Start out going SOUTH on BUCKLAND ST toward TOLLAND TURNPIKE. 0.1 miles
2:Stay STRAIGHT to go onto ADAMS ST. 1.1 miles
3:Turn LEFT onto MIDDLE TURNPIKE W. 0.5 miles
4:Take A Right at light to Manchester Parkade, Time Out is on Left by the Stairs

Total Est. Time: 4 minutes Total Est. Distance: 1.75 miles

Headliner: Adam Ferrara



Click Here For Details

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: Comedy Nite- Wacky Wednesday At The Funny Bone Comedy Club Nov 28
